sourcesContent:
<style src="./HomeView.css"></style>
<template src="./HomeView.html"></template>
<script>
  import PagetitleComponent from '@/components/PagetitleComponent/PagetitleComponent.vue'

  // @ is an alias to /src
  // import HelloWorld from '@/components/HelloWorld.vue'

  export default {
    name: 'HomeView',
    data() {
      return {
        areaName: "Главная"
      }
    },
    components: {
      // HelloWorld,
      PagetitleComponent
    },
    inject: ["areaList"],
    computed: {
        areasList() {
            let n_areaList = [];
            for (let i=2; i<this.areaList.length; i++) {
                n_areaList[i-2] = this.areaList[i]; 
            }
            return n_areaList;
        }
    },
    methods: {
      readHtmlFile(input) {
        let reader = new FileReader();
        let file = input;
        
        reader.readAsText(file);
        reader.onload = function() {
          console.log(reader.result);
        };

        reader.onerror = function() {
          console.log(reader.error);
        };
      }
    }
  }
</script>
